short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds driving distances and times on purpleport.com profiles and sorting by distance and duration to search results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension gives improved member to member distance accuracy by using route planning calculations rather than crow flies distances. It also adds approximate journey times.

* the distance shown on member profile pages is changed to be the distance by road and also shows journey time
* profile search results add text below the avatar with distance and travel time
* the search results page has options added to sort by distance and duration in addition to the default ordering
* casting call search results and the detailed casting call view show travel distances
* results over the chosen search radius are dimmed to make it easy to ignore at a glance. They are undimmed if hovered over.
* a glitch with the first page of recent images is addressed and the date range of images is shown

Note: While travel distances are likely to be pretty accurate and tend to agree with Google mapping, journey times may be optimistic as they do not take into account traffic flow.
